General.Name: e-Credible Co. Ltd
General.Description: e-Credible Co., Ltd. provides corporate credit certification services in Korea. The company offers DNA, a corporate credit authentication service that manages transaction risk by utilizing corporate credit ratings for business-to-business transactions. It also provides Wisduspool, a corporate information services; and R-MIS that monitors the credit risks. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Samsung IT Valley, Seoul, South Korea, 08380
